short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove the new Wikipedia style to use the previous/historical full sized version.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Since August 2020 a new design have been adopted by some branches of Wikimedia, and therefore Wikipedia. This new design aim to reduce content line-lenght, but do it mostly in a way I, and according to the Wikipedia discussion page a lot of peoples, consider counter productive and harmful.

This extension provide a simple way to restore the previous and historical apparence by removing the new attributes (HTML classes) in the page.
